Class Zombie

java.lang.Object
  greenfoot.Actor
      Zombie

public abstract class Zombie
extends greenfoot.Actor

A programmable zombie character.

Version:
1.0
Author:
bdahlem

move

public final void move()
Move forward one step.

plan

public abstract void plan()
The special thing about this zombie is that has a plan. The zombie's plan is run in a separate thread. Commands, such as move() and turnRight() wait their turn so that they can happen asynchronously with animations, etc.

playSound

public void playSound(int index)
Play a sound

putBrain

public final void putBrain()
Put down a brain if the Zombie has one. End if not.
